getSettings.description: Returns the current state of webhook settings for the given app. These settings include the app's configured target URL and max concurrency limit.

updateSettings.description: Used to set the webhook target URL and max concurrency limit for the given app.

deleteSettings.description: Resets webhook target URL to empty, and max concurrency limit to 0 for the given app.

getAll.description: Returns full details for all existing subscriptions for the given app.

create.description: Creates a new webhook subscription for the given app. Each subscription in an app must be unique.

batchUpdate.description: Activates or deactivates target app subscriptions.

update.description: Updates the details for an existing subscription.

delete.description: Permanently deletes a subscription. This cannot be undone.
